Control Name: 1.2.2 There is a cost owner for every service used by this workload.
Control Statement: Every service should have a cost owner that is tracking and is responsible for cost. This drives responsibility and awareness on who owns the cost tracking.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 1.2 How do you govern budgets and application lifespan for this workload?
